text:
e="preserve">Minoru Makihara (January 12, 1930December 13, 2020) was a British-born Japanese business executive. He was the chief executive of the Mitsubishi Corporation from 1992 to 1998 and chairman from 1998 to 2004. He was born in London.
Makihara died on December 13, 2020 in Tokyo from heart failure at the age of 90.
